name: Shivatech 2025
description: Technology is not just about machinesâ€”it is about reimagining the future.

Shivatech 2025 is a National Level Inter-College Technical Fest, designed to ignite creativity, innovation, and problem-solving among young minds. It is a confluence of engineering, management, agriculture, and pharmacy students, all collaborating to shape ideas into impactful solutions.
By combining Ideathon, Hackathon, and a one-day Technical Fest, Shivatech 2025 becomes a 3-day innovation marathon that nurtures ideas, builds prototypes, and celebrates excellence.
